divs: sighting details1. i was walking home with stuff food. 2. i just happen to notice. 3. i thought they were chinese lanterns or fireworks of some kind. 4. describe the object? all the reports in the area are the same. check the google map. 5. describe your feelings? i was shocked, they kept coming. a few before i ran to collect my camera and then a few more. 6. they just kept going up into the same spot and with low clouds i lost them. 7. youtube video [link moved to fi section\cms\tg]
trends: There has been one other sighting in St James
There were no other sightings in St James on or around September 2nd 2012
Summary: THERE WERE MULTIPLE RED AND ORANGE LIGHTS IN THE SKY. low sort of fuzzy, sort of reddish
